Package main

Class TaxCalculator

java.lang.Object
main.TaxCalculator
public class TaxCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
The TaxCalculator class is used to calculate tax for a given property

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TaxCalculator()
    No-arg constructor for TaxCalculator
    TaxCalculator​(int estMarketValue, java.lang.String locationCategory, java.lang.String principalPrivateRes)
    Constructor specifying property details for tax calculation

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void fees()
    Add a fixed charge fee to the tax to be calculated
    double getTax()
    Calculates annual tax based on current property information in this tax calculator
    void livingAreaTax()
    Calculates the tax based on location category of the property to be taxed
    static double overdueFees​(double fees, int year, int cYear)
    Calculates fees overdue from previous years
    void principalResFees()
    Calculates tax based on whether a property was marked as principal private residence
    void propertyTax()
    Calculates tax based on property value
    void reload​(java.lang.String line)
    Load data of another property into this TaxCalculator
    void setFees​(double fee, int index)
    Sets the fee for the fixed charge or the charge if this property isn't principal private residence
    void setLevys​(double levy, int index)
    Sets the value of levy for property value percentage tax rate for a valid property value range
    void setPropertyValue​(double propertyValue, int index)
    Sets the value of property value tax range for this TaxCalculator
    void setRate​(double rate, int index)
    Sets rate of tax for location category at a valid index

  • Constructor Details

    • TaxCalculator

      public TaxCalculator()
      No-arg constructor for TaxCalculator

    • TaxCalculator

      public TaxCalculator​(int estMarketValue, java.lang.String locationCategory, java.lang.String principalPrivateRes)
      Constructor specifying property details for tax calculation
      Parameters:
      estMarketValue - the int for property market value
      locationCategory - the String of locaction type
      principalPrivateRes - the String for YES or NO

  • Method Details

    • setRate

      public void setRate​(double rate, int index)
      Sets rate of tax for location category at a valid index
      Parameters:
      rate - the double for the new rate of tax
      index - the integer for index at which the tax is changed: 0=city 1=largeTown 2=smallTown 3=village 4=countryside

    • setLevys

      public void setLevys​(double levy, int index)
      Sets the value of levy for property value percentage tax rate for a valid property value range
      Parameters:
      levy - the double ew levy value to be applied to this TaxCalculator
      index - the integer for index in the array: 0=propertyValue>maxValue 1=propertyValue>=middleValue 2=propertyValue>=minValue

    • setPropertyValue

      public void setPropertyValue​(double propertyValue, int index)
      Sets the value of property value tax range for this TaxCalculator
      Parameters:
      propertyValue - the double for the new property value tax interval
      index - the integer of index for the interval boundary to be modified: 0=maxValue 1=middleValue 2=minValue

    • setFees

      public void setFees​(double fee, int index)
      Sets the fee for the fixed charge or the charge if this property isn't principal private residence
      Parameters:
      fee - the double for the new fee
      index - the integer for index of array with value to be modified: 0=setFee 1=principalResidenceFee

    • overdueFees

      public static double overdueFees​(double fees, int year, int cYear)
      Calculates fees overdue from previous years
      Parameters:
      fees - the double for fees up to this moment
      year - the integer for year when tax was originally due
      cYear - the String for the year when the tax was paid
      Returns:
      the total fees overdue using this TaxCalculator's rates

    • livingAreaTax

      public void livingAreaTax()
      Calculates the tax based on location category of the property to be taxed

    • propertyTax

      public void propertyTax()
      Calculates tax based on property value

    • principalResFees

      public void principalResFees()
      Calculates tax based on whether a property was marked as principal private residence

    • fees

      public void fees()
      Add a fixed charge fee to the tax to be calculated

    • getTax

      public double getTax()
      Calculates annual tax based on current property information in this tax calculator
      Returns:
      the double for total fees to be paid

    • reload

      public void reload​(java.lang.String line)
      Load data of another property into this TaxCalculator
      Parameters:
      line - the String in csv format that contains
